text: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil is a game-changer for anyone seeking healthier, shinier, and stronger hair. Packed with nutrient-rich, biotin-infused ingredients, this treatment nourishes and strengthens hair from root to tip, leaving behind a refreshing, invigorating scent.One of its standout features is its ability to smooth split ends, providing a sleek and polished look. Additionally, it soothes dry scalp and combats dandruff, thanks to its rich blend of over 30 essential oils and nutrients.What sets this product apart is its versatility‚Äîit's suitable for all hair types, including chemically-treated, braided, and weaved hair.As a woman who values natural beauty and effective results, I am impressed by Mielle Organics' commitment to using gentle, organic ingredients. Overall, this product has become an essential part of my hair care routine, leaving me with luscious, radiant hair that I love.
title: Good stuff
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

text: To me, this oil feels kind of slimy (which isn't a bad thing in my opinion), but I feel it works great. I'm not sure if it promotes growth but it definitely helps my hair feel more hydrated! Has a minty scent. I would highly recommend!
title: Great
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: I was losing clumps of hair so randomly back in October or November. So i started using this oil every other day for about a month now and I'm seeing a LOT OF IMPROVEMENT with my hair fall. It has greatly reduced my hair fall, it went from 100+ strands to ~25 strands in the shower. I found that if you deep oil and wear a satin or silk cap and then sleep overnight with it then you lose less than 10 strands. But consistency is key. The quality of my hair is getting better too. I see very few baby hairs growing at the moment, i think I'll have more after 2 to 3 months. My hair length hasn't really changed much tho. But I'm liking it so far.
title: It helped me a lot
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: I bought this product to help with genetic hair loss. I have only been using it for 2 weeks, and I believe I'm noticing the baby hairs at the top of my head are a bit longer and more pronounced now. Other than that, it's a little hard for me to tell if my bald spots (mostly at my parietal ridge) are really growing back in. However, this oil has provided another benefit I didn't expect: it's restored my natural curl pattern. I oil my hair, massage it in, and let it "marinate" for a couple hours every wash day (every 2/3 days), and I've noticed my hair air dries SO wavy now, with almost no tangles. As someone who has struggled to preserve and take care of my wavy hair, this was a lifesaver. My hair looks properly curly and voluminous now (as opposed to stringy and frizzy before), such that my bald spots are MUCH less noticeable. Additionally, the coarseness of my hair has improved a LOT - my hair hasn't been so soft and shiny since I was a kid. Regardless of whether it causes regrowth, this oil has improved my hair's appearance and texture so much that it was 100% worth the buy.
title: Restored curl pattern, softened hair
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: But I'm sticking with it.

text: After returning from a long international trip, I was experiencing hair fall, which I attributed to changes in water, food, etc. While giving myself some time to readjust, I came across the Mielle rosemary mint scalp and hair strengthening oil listed by amazon among the bestsellers in Beauty and Personal care category. At first glance, the name did not interest me because I already have a few essential oils for hair care. However, the enticing price ~$8 tempted me to make the purchase, and I thought I wouldn't lose much in case it didn't help me.The very first time, I massaged 8-10 drops of the oil in the evening and let it stay overnight (rosemary oil may delay sleep in some individuals). The next morning, I noticed that the hair fall had reduced drastically after just one use. Probably, the oil treatment instantly strengthens the roots.The cause of hair fall varies from individual to individual, so does the remedy. Depending on your needs, start with a few drops of the oil and proceed with overnight treatment only if you are comfortable. I hope the oil works for you the way it did for me, and I will update my progress after a few months.The product is sold in a dark-colored glass dropper bottle and does not come with a tamper-proof seal. Since it is recommended for daily use, a push pump bottle should also be an option for customers who prefer it. This may protect the essential oils and other ingredients from degradation caused by daily exposure to light and air.Important: I paid for the purchase.
title: Is it justified to be placed among the bestsellers?
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024

text: I get very dry and flaky scalp especially in the winter and my hair has been very dry as well. I read that rosemary oil can help dry and itchy scalp. I was worried putting and oil on my scalp would cause it to be oily but it hasn‚Äôt at all. I wash my hair about 3 times a week, and after I wash it while it‚Äôs still slightly damp I massage 4 drops into my scalp and 4 drops through the ends. It only took a few times for me to notice a difference. My scalp is no longer dry and itchy, it feels relieved, and no more flakes. Also the ends of my hair are much softer. I find my hair isn‚Äôt getting greasy as fast probably because my scalp isn‚Äôt dry so it‚Äôs not over producing oil anymore. This oil has a nice smell too it too. I‚Äôd give it a try, it‚Äôs affordable and the bottle is going to last me a while.

text: Didn't do anything for my hair. I would not recommend using it on the scalp, especially for those with serious hair thinning issues. It also leaves a unpleasant greasy smell after a while of application.
title: Don't use on your scalp
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

text: I'm not sure this oil did much for me. After several weeks of using it every other day, I did not notice any difference in hair thickness or a reduction in hair fall. It doesn't smell much like rosemary, the ingredient that is supposed to stimulate hair growth, so maybe its concentration in the oil was too low to be effective. At least I didn't experience any irritation, but I do not think it is worth buying again.
title: Not sure it had an effect, but no harm done
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

text: I saw this product being advertised on TikTok and decided to take a chance on it and am extremely impressed with how well the oil has been helping my hair! I use the product on hair wash day and will let the product sit on my scalp and hair for hours and then wash it out. The smell is also a big plus! Definitely worth your time and money!
title: Hair Oil
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

text: The only way I can tell I have this product on is the minty smell.
title: This product does make a noticeable improvement for me
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

text: I‚Äôve used this once. I am going to try it again, but VERY sparingly! It made my hair very greasy looking and I had to wash my hair again. My scalp has been itching terribly since I used it. I may be allergic to some ingredients. One more try, but not until the weekend!
title: Use very little!
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
